info.name: Voorbeelden Nationale Terminologieserver [incl authenticatie]
info.description:
Deze collectie gebruikt variabelen uit de environment:
- username
- password

Deze moeten overeenkomen met de gebruikersnaam en wachtwoord van je account in de Nationale Terminologieserver.

request.description: The request sends two lookups - one of a LOINC code and one of a SNOMED CT code.

exec: tests["Parameter has key 'name' with value 'outcome"] = jsonData.parameter[0].name === 'outcome';

request.description: Definiëert een codeA en codeB in de request Body.

exec: tests["Parameter has key 'name' with value 'outcome"] = jsonData.parameter[0].name === 'outcome';

item.name: Zoek alle CodeSystems, toon alleen naam en url
Zoek alle CodeSystems waarvan de URL start met http://snomed.info

query.description: Paging support - how many codes should be provided in a partial view. If count = 0, the client is asking how large the expansion is.
Paging support - where to start if a subset is desired (default = 0). This refers to items, not pages, i.e. offset = 2 means that the second matching record will be returned, not the second page.
Whether or not inactive concepts are included in the expansion (false by default)
Whether or not to include the logical definition and metadata of the value set in the expansion (true by default)
Specifies the language to be used for description in the expansions i.e. the language to be used for ValueSet.expansion.contains.display
Whether or not concepts included in the expansion should also come with their designations (false by default)
A text filter that is applied to restrict the codes that are returned (this is useful in a UI context). Ontoserver implements a multi-prefix match scoring algorithm.
